summary: AS I WAS DRIVING MY A/C STOPPED BLOWING COLD AIR. BATTERY LIGHT CAME ON THEN ALL THE DASH INDICATORS STARTED BLINKING WRONG INCLUDING MY SEAT BELT INDICATOR, RADIO SHUT OFF, ETC. CAR DROVE AS IF IT HAD LITTLE POWER THEN STEERING JERKED AS IF CAR WAS GOING TO SHUT DOWN. PULLED OVER AND TURNED OFF CAR AND CAR WOULD NOT RESTART. TOOK TO THE MECHANIC WHO CONFIRMED IS THE ALTERNATOR. VEHICLE ONLY HS 60K MILES.
